review: Quite convenient. Plugging this thing into my TV/Projector leaves a much smaller footprint and energy bill than an old laptop as a media center. Netflix and Plex apps are necessary.Sometimes, though, I cannot connect to it and I do not understand why. It is quite inconsistent in this regard -- like I can stream one episode, and then I cannot play the next one, etc. Restarting does not fix, it is really random. Also, the ecosystem is not AMAZING yet, but it is getting there. I got mine upon release and the ecosystem was really bad back then, so I really can't complain about the current one.Plex is necessary because if you drag certain video files into Chrome, it will play the video but not the sound. I could not play a lot of custom videos prior to the release of the Plex app, which was frustrating.The UI addition to your apps are also not amazing. You cannot just play next on the Netflix app, for example, you have to exit and go all the way to episode selector to select the next one. If you just hit play from the main screen after your current episode ends, it will just replay it.....I'll try to keep this guide updated based on software updates I receive.
